document_data.name: Finderal Birchspear
document_data.mainbody: '''Finderal Birchspear''' was an [[elven]] soldier from [[New Sharandar]] who was tasked with the protection of his people.{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter: Fury of the Feywild}}
document_data.Activities: Finderal led a group of [[Iliyanbruen]] elves in an offensive against the forces of the [[Feydark]] when they threatened the natural growth and wildlife found in the [[Feywild]].
document_data.History: After [[Malabog|King Malabog]] began his campaign against the elves of New Sharandar ''circa'' the  {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Finderal accompanied a few other elves to an outpost near the [[dark fey enclave]] in the Feydark. He helped the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] to cull the scores of dark fey creatures, by wiping out nests of [[quickling]]s, as well as slaying [[fomorian]] witches and armored [[troll]] warriors.
